suggest.meta_keywords: Azion Edge Functions, serverless computing, JavaScript, WebAssembly, Edge Application, Jamstack, SSR, Next.js, serverless applications, Edge Functions management
suggest.meta_description: Discover Azion Edge Functions for scalable, serverless computing at the network edge. Utilize JavaScript, WebAssembly, and manage edge applications effectively.
